1560920.name: HardCop 2 Demo
1560920.description:
VR Action Game for Valve Index. And Hey, its not a Wave Shooter!
About 20min to 40min long, self contained Adventure of oldscool Action.
Free locomotion with zero assist (thats a feature).
All the Reloading you would want in a VR game.
Pumpgun is reloaded through rotation like in T2.
The demo Version is the same as the paid Version, so play that, and if you hat
fun consider supporting me with the paid Version.


special thanks to E and Coco!
1560920.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
